3000 character maximum including formatting.

Click the Pencil icon to edit your signature. You can create additional signatures that can be used for specific purposes, including lead pages, presentations, lead emails, prospect emails and customer emails. You can create signatures for specific lead pages and presentations by specifying the corresponding lead page # or presentation #. Click the "Add New Signature" link above or click the Pencil icon of an existing signature below to edit.
